name: Post-Quantum
description: Post-Quantum is a UK-based company specialising in secure communications, authentication, encryption and blockchain. The company offers a modular cyber security toolkit to the financial services, government, and other critical sectors.
one_liner: Post-Quantum is a UK-based company specialising in secure communications, authentication, encryption and blockchain. The company offers a modular cyber security toolkit to the financial services, government, and other critical sectors.
